column5: Determines if the process SHALL run in estimate mode or not. When in estimate mode multiple solutions SHOULD be generated.
The position of the DieLayout on the sheet

A ConvertingConfig element describes a range of sheet sizes that can be taken into account to create a new DieLayout. Typically a ConvertingConfig will correspond to a single combination of printing press and further finishing equipment such as die cutters.
Step and repeat parameters for a set of ShapeDef.
